entry.title: Parabolic 2x4 Troffer 4 Lamp T8 18 Cell Surface Mount
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mobern
Type: Flourescent Troffer Fixtures
Price: 135.00

Premium surface mounted deep cell parabolic fixture designed for maximum efficiency and visual comfort. Ideal for commercial and industrial buildings requiring general illumination with surface configurations and low glare.


  • P3 Technology - Post Powder Paint
  • >90% Reflectivity
  • Corrosion and scratch resistant
  • Smooth edges for easy handling
  • Clean appearance with no exposed fasteners
  • Low iridescent louver is maintenance free semi-specular anodized aluminum
  • Louver hinges and latches from either side
  • Black reveal provides gap free floating louver appearance
  • Various cell configurations available
  • Pre-lamp available
  • Every fixture is individually tested
  • UL listed for damp locations

s:variant.title: 4 Lamp T8 2x4 Parabolic Troffer 18 Cell Surface Mount
